projectPurpose: To provide a reliable, easy-to-use, and automated solution for backing up and restoring PC video game save data across various platforms and game launchers, preventing data loss.
mainFeatures: Back up data from over 19,000 games plus custom entries
Backup and restore for Steam, GOG, Epic, Heroic, Lutris, and other game libraries
Supports saves stored as files and in the Windows registry

alternatives.name: Game Backup Monitor
mainFeatures: Runs in the background and backs up on game exit

alternatives.name: FreeFileSync
mainFeatures: Supports cloud storage (SFTP, FTP, Google Drive)

marketPositioning: Ludusavi is positioned as a comprehensive, cross-platform, and open-source game save backup solution that offers broad compatibility with various game launchers and an extensive list of supported games. It differentiates itself from older, Windows-only alternatives like GameSave Manager by providing multi-platform support, including Linux and Steam Deck, a larger database of recognized games, faster performance, and the flexibility of both GUI and CLI interfaces, along with cloud sync capabilities. Compared to built-in cloud saves, it offers a unified backup strategy across all platforms and allows for local backups and management of games without native cloud support. Its open-source nature also contributes to its appeal for users seeking transparency and community-driven development.
